participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Determined, ambitious, and physically active. He is someone who enjoys challenges and values hard work.
participant_1.background: I drink protein powder with nothing but water. I like to watch ma. My prized possession is a bowie knife. I lift weights, but I never do squats. I am entering the police academy this summer.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Friendly, nurturing, and creative. She has a passion for helping others and enjoys artistic pursuits.
participant_2.background: I have a pencil thin mustache. My mother is a ballet dancer. I have six tattoos, all of cats. I am a medical file clerk.

content.text: Hi, I'm a police officer in training. How about yourself?
I'm a medical file clerk, it's not the most exciting job, but it pays the bills.
It's good to hear that you're doing something you're passionate about.
I love working with people and helping people, so it's a good fit.
That's great to hear. I'm sure you're a great asset to your company.
Thank you, I try my best.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to watch movies, I'm a big fan of the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
Me too, I'm really excited for the new Spider-Man movie.
Me too, I can't wait to see how Tom Holland does in the role.
I'm sure he'll do great, he's a great actor.
I agree, I'm really looking forward to it.
So, what are you looking forward to in the future?
I'm hoping to eventually become a doctor, but I'm not sure if I'm ready for the schooling yet.
Well, I'm sure you'll be great at it, if you're passionate about it.
Thank you, I appreciate that.
So, what's your favorite kind of music?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is probably alternative rock.
Me too, I love the Foo Fighters.
Me too, they're great.
So, what's your favorite thing to do on a Saturday night?
I like to go out to dinner with my friends, or watch a movie.
Me too, I like to go out to dinner with my friends too.
It's always nice to have a good time with friends.
